text: Fred Roy Harris (November 13, 1930 â€“ November 23, 2024) was an American politician. He was the United States senator of Oklahoma. He served as senator from 1964 to 1973. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Harris ran for President of the United States in 1972, losing the nomination to George McGovern. He ran again in 1976, but lost the Democratic Party primary to Jimmy Carter. Harris was born in Walters, Oklahoma. He died on November 23, 2024 at a hospital in Albuquerque, New Mexico at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2024 deaths Category:1972 United States presidential candidates Category:1976 United States presidential candidates Category:United States senators from Oklahoma Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Fred R. Harris
